properties.entry: Unavailable in Nintendo eShop on Wii U.

In order to proceed, you must enter
information using the Wii U GamePad.

Please turn the GamePad on now.

An error has occurred.
Please restart Nintendo eShop
and try again.

For help, please make a note
of the error code and visit
support.nintendo.com.

An error has occurred.
Please try again later.

For help, please make a note
of the error code and visit
support.nintendo.com.

Unable to connect to the server.

Either the server is experiencing high
traffic volumes or a server error has
occurred. Please try again later.

To learn more about the server's current
status, visit support.nintendo.com.
Only the Wii U GamePad can be used to browse Nintendo eShop.

A system update is required.
To get the update, go to
System Settings and select
System Update.
Your current system language is not compatible with this country setting.The language below will be used.
Your current system language is not compatible with this country setting. Please choose a language from the options shown.

Here you can buy and download software,
view videos about your favorite titles, and more!

Please read the following information regarding the use of this service.
Select Close to close Nintendo eShop.

You can choose whether or not to receive Nintendo eShop
notifications, which may include commercial information such as
marketing or advertising messages. Such notifications will be sent
by Nintendo via SpotPass and will appear on the Wii U Menu.
Would you like to opt in to receiving these notifications?

Please scroll down to see the entire text.

By linking your Club Nintendo account, you will be eligible for added benefits. For details, please see club.nintendo.com.

Only one Club Nintendo account can be linked to a user. Club Nintendo accounts cannot be linked to multiple users.

Users who do not have a Club Nintendo account can skip this step. An account can always be linked at a later date.
Your Club Nintendo membership is now linked.

There is no information available for this
software title.
Select a publisher to search for.
What do you want to search for?
Select a genre to search for.

If you have a download code, you can redeem it
here for software, downloadable content, etc.

To redownload content for a code you've already redeemed,
go to My Menu ⇒ Your Downloads, and then choose the
content you want to download.

The number you entered is a Nintendo
eShop Card activation code. These funds
will now be added to your balance.

The download code you entered could not
be recognized. Please check the code and
try entering it again.

The number you entered is a Nintendo
eShop Card activation code.

However, this type of code is not usable
in your country of residence.

The code you entered could not be
recognized. It may have been entered
incorrectly. Please check the code and
try entering it again.

(Please note that hyphens and the
letters o, i, and z are not used, while
the numbers 0, 1, and 2 may be used.)

No download code is necessary, as you
have downloaded this software before.

Could not find any matches.
Change the search filters and try again.
There is currently not enough data available to display charts.
People who downloaded this also downloaded...

Close Nintendo eShop and start Miiverse?
Select the demo you want to try.
This demo is not currently available.

Nintendo eShop will now close so the
Internet browser can start and you can
view the selected information.
Select Close to close Nintendo eShop and return to the game.
You can also view Nintendo eShop information here.

Your wish list is full, so you cannot add
any more titles.

Please remove some titles from your
wish list if you want to add more.

Would you like to open your wish list?
The following controllers are required to play this game.
The following controllers may improve your enjoyment of the game.
The following accessories are required to play this game.
The following accessories may improve your enjoyment of the game.
Touch this button to view video-quality options and software information.
Tap this button to view information for downloadable content.

High-quality video offers a better picture but may suffer from
stuttering depending on the speed of your Internet connection.
If this occurs, please select standard quality.
Downloadable content is available for this software.

Are you sure you want to close the
downloadable-content catalog? You have
marked content for purchase or
download.

To purchase or download this content,
select Cancel now to keep the catalog
open and then go to the purchase
screen.

If you are sure you want to close the
downloadable-content catalog, select
Close.
Nothing is available for purchase at this time.

To use this downloadable content, the software title %{title} is required.
Please make sure that you own this software before purchasing.
You cannot purchase this as it contains downloadable content you already own.

Previously purchased or updated
downloadable content has not yet
been installed.

Please try again after completing
the installation.

To check the status of the installation,
press the HOME Button and select
Download Management.

You cannot purchase this as it contains
duplicate downloadable content.

There is some duplicate downloadable
content. No reduction or refunds can be
given for the duplicate content. Is this OK?

You've reached the maximum number of
items that can be purchased or downloaded
at one time.

This downloadable content includes content
you already own. Download it anyway?

When purchasing or downloading this
downloadable content, any required updates
related to previously purchased DLC will
also be downloaded.

Preparing...

Please do not turn off the power.

There is not enough free space available
to update the downloadable content.

To create sufficient space for the update,
go to Data Management in System Settings
and move or delete some software.

An update is required to use the downloadable
content you purchased.

Update now?

To use the updated content, go to Download Management
in the HOME Menu to check that the update data has been
downloaded. If the update data has been downloaded
successfully, apply the update by launching the
corresponding software title.

An update is required to use the
downloadable content you purchased.

Update now?

To use the updated content go to Download
Management in the HOME Menu to check that
the update data has been downloaded. If the
update data has been downloaded
successfully, apply the update by launching
the corresponding software title.

An update is required to use the downloadable content you purchased previously.
Updated versions of this content will also be downloaded.

You can't spend more than %{price} on
a single transaction.

The total cost of your selections exceeds
that maximum value. Please change your
selections and try again.
You do not have any items checked.
There are no valid passes at this time.

The pass will be valid from the time of
purchase. The validity period of the pass
cannot be automatically extended. If you
want to extend the pass's validity, you will
need to purchase another pass. If you
purchase another pass before the current
pass expires, the new period will be added
to your current validity period.
You cannot purchase a pass that exceeds
the total validity period of %{0} day(s).
The validity period is displayed according
to the time zone set for your
Nintendo Network ID.
All registered users on your Wii U will be
be able to use a purchased pass while it is
valid. (Each user will need to launch
Nintendo eShop before using the pass.)

The pass will be valid from the time it is
downloaded. The validity period of the pass
cannot be automatically extended. If you
want to extend the pass's validity, you will
need to purchase or redeem another pass.
If you download another pass before the current
pass expires, the new period will be added
to your current validity period.
You cannot download a pass that exceeds
the total validity period of %{0} day(s).
The validity period is displayed according
to the time zone set for your
Nintendo Network ID.
All registered users on your Wii U console
will be able to use a downloaded pass while
it is valid. Each user will need to launch
Nintendo eShop before using the pass.
You do not need to purchase a pass because you already have an unlimited pass.

You do not need to download a pass,
because you already have an unlimited pass.

To use this pass, the software title %{title} is required.
Please ensure that you own this software before purchasing.

The software title %{title} is required to use this pass.
Please ensure that you own this software before downloading.

You cannot purchase a pass because a pass bought by another
user of this console is still valid. New passes must be bought by
the purchaser of the current pass.

You cannot download a pass, because a pass downloaded by another
user of this console is still valid. New passes must be obtained by
the user who downloaded the current pass.

This pass cannot be used here because
its content has already been acquired
on this console, and this can only occur
once per console.

This pass can only be used with this software.
It cannot be used with any other software.

You will need to connect to the Internet to use this service.

There may be times when this service is temporarily
unavailable due to server maintenance, damage, or other
unforeseeable circumstances.
Cannot purchase this pass because the validity period would exceed the maximum of %{0} day(s).
The pass cannot be downloaded, as it would cause the validity period to go over %{0} day(s).

If there's not enough free space available, go to Data Management in System Settings and move or delete some software.

You will need to close Nintendo eShop in order to go to the Data Management screen.
There is not enough free space available.

If you still don't have enough space after moving or deleting
some software, try using a high-capacity USB storage
device. For more details, see the Wii U Electronic Manual or
the Nintendo website.

About Install Locations:
The console will prioritize the USB storage device when
choosing an install location. If you already have data
(e.g., save data) for software that you had installed
previously, the software will be installed in the same location
as the existing data. If there isn't enough free space, please
try moving the data to a different location.
(Use Data Management in System Settings to move your data.)
You do not have sufficient funds to make this purchase. Please add funds or use your credit card to complete this purchase.
Pay Remainder Using a Credit Card

Some of this content is already
on this console.

Download the content?
This software is already on this console.

This downloadable content cannot be
purchased.
If you already own New Super Mario
Bros. U, please update to the latest
version of the software to make this
downloadable content available for
purchase.
Please start the software from the
Wii U Menu to update.
If you do not own New Super Mario
Bros. U, you will need to purchase either
a retail or downloadable version of the
game to make this downloadable
content available for purchase.

This downloadable content has already
been installed from a disc. Do you want
to proceed to the purchase screen,
where you can purchase it anyway?

To use this downloadable content,
the following software title is required:
%{title}
Do you own this title?
If you don't own it, please select Back.

To use this pass, the following software title is required:
%{title}
Do you own this title?
If you don't own it, please select Back.
Select Purchase to finalize your payment.
Title not playable before release date.
Previously purchased items can be redownloaded at no extra cost.
Demo versions are free to download.
Software redeemed with a download code can be downloaded for free.
This is a free downloadable-content update.

You've redeemed a Just for You offer.

Processing...
Please wait.

The process may take some time.
Please do not turn off the power.

Processing...
Please wait.

The process may take some time.
Please do not turn off the power.

You currently have too many titles
waiting to be downloaded.

Start Download Management from the
HOME Menu, and either install completed
downloads or remove any unwanted pending
downloads.

After that, please try downloading
this software / downloadable content via
My Menu ⇒ Your Downloads.

The download will start automatically.

Download progress can be checked from
Download Management in the HOME Menu.

You can view the receipt at any time via
My Menu ⇒ Account Activity.

A receipt will be sent to the e-mail address registered to your Nintendo Account.
If you used a child account, the receipt will be sent to the parent or guardian's e-mail address.
Please check the receipt to view purchase details and additional information.

The pass is valid as of now.
If you want to play immediately, close Nintendo eShop.
There is no need to download this item because it is already installed.

Something is wrong with the downloadable content acquired for this
software. Please go to Data Management in System Settings, delete
this downloadable content, and then try downloading it again.

Codes issued to you are written on the receipt after purchase.
The receipt can be viewed at any time in My Menu ⇒ Account Activity.

Codes issued to you will be sent to the e-mail address registered to your Nintendo Account.
If you used a child account, the receipt will be sent to the parent or guardian's e-mail address.

The coupon code you entered could not
be recognized. Please check the code and
try entering it again.
No Just for You offers are currently available.
Valid for one use within the specified period.
Valid for unlimited uses within the specified period.
Here you can rate the titles you've played.

The ESRB rating for this title does not
recommend this software for players of
the age that you have entered. Your
rating cannot be processed.
On a scale of one to five stars, how would you rate your satisfaction with this software?
Who do you think this title appeals to?
What kind of play style is this title more suited for?

There is no software you can review at this time.

To review a title, you must have played it for at least one hour.

You cannot submit ratings as the Sending of User Information
setting has been set to Don't Send.

To change your Sending of User Informationsettings, take the following steps:

Select User Settings
⇒ View/Modify User Information
⇒ Send User Information to Nintendo
⇒ Send
You don't have any titles on your wish list.
Remove this software title from your wish list?
You can add any game that interests you to your wish list.
Make sure you have sufficient funds before purchasing software.

To download Wii software you must add Wii Points
to the Wii Shop Channel on the Wii Menu.
Add Funds with a Nintendo eShop Card
Add Funds with a Credit Card

The Add Funds function is not
currently available in your country.
Enter the code on the back of the Nintendo eShop card.
Add Funds with a Nintendo eShop Card

You cannot add an amount that
would cause your balance to
exceed %{price}.

Could not confirm the activation code.

Please check the code and try
entering it again.

These funds will be added to the balance of
your Nintendo Network ID.

The funds you add here cannot be used on
the Wii Shop Channel or Nintendo DSi Shop.

Please enter the 16-digit activation code.

Nintendo Points Cards cannot be used in Nintendo eShop.
Where can I get an activation code?

The number you entered is a download code.
This download code will now be processed.

Enter an amount to add to your balance.

You cannot add an amount that would
cause your balance to exceed %{price}.

Failed to authenticate stored credit-card
information. The information has been deleted.
Add funds to your balance using this credit-card information?

If you use another credit card, the stored
credit-card information will be deleted.

Is this OK?

Credit-card information has been deleted.
You can now enter a new credit card.
Please enter the four-to-eight-character password used to secure your credit-card information.
Please be careful when entering your password. After three incorrect entries, your credit-card information will be deleted for security reasons.

By selecting Add, you will confirm payment, and the
value shown below will be added to your balance.

Funds added are non-refundable, unless required by law.
Funds can be used to purchase digital content, including in-game
content, each sold separately. Access to shopping services can be
restricted via Parental Controls.

Once you add funds, you cannot cancel or get a refund.
The funds you add here cannot be used on the
Wii Shop Channel or the Nintendo DSi Shop.
Select the credit card to use for this purchase.
This will be encrypted before sending.

The credit-card information
was not entered correctly.

Please re-enter it.
The Card Verification Code is located on the back of your credit card.

Nintendo complies with Payment Card Industry Standards
to protect customer credit-card information.

You can store your credit-card information
for ease of use in future purchases.

In order to safeguard your information, you'll need to set up a password.
Please note that when your stored credit card expires, its information will be deleted automatically.
Please enter a four-to-eight-character password to secure your credit-card information.
Please be careful when entering your password. After three incorrect entries, your credit-card information will be deleted for security reasons.
Please enter the password again to confirm.

The password you entered includes
nonalphanumeric characters.

Please enter a password using
only letters and numbers.

Each character of the password
you have entered is the same.
For security reasons, use differing
characters. Passwords should be four
to eight alphanumeric characters
in length.

The passwords do not match.

Please try again.

This will delete all of the user ratings you have
submitted. This data cannot be recovered
once deleted. Are you sure you want to delete

Select settings to adjust.
Scroll down to see all available options.

You can change the language setting here.
Select the language you want to use.
Nintendo eShop needs to close in order to apply this setting.

To change languages, Nintendo eShop
needs to close and be relaunched.

Change language?

You can choose whether or not to receive Nintendo eShop
notifications, which may include commercial information such as
marketing or advertising messages. Such notifications will be sent
by Nintendo via SpotPass and will appear on the Wii U Menu.
Would you like to opt in to receiving these notifications?

You will not receive notifications if the Online Interaction in Games
restriction has been enabled in Parental Controls.

You will not receive notifications from
Nintendo eShop.

(You can change this setting later.)

You will receive Nintendo eShop
notifications.

(You can change this setting later.)

Are you sure you want to delete this
credit-card information?

No credit-card information has been stored.

Credit-card information can be stored only when adding funds.
You can store your credit-card information to make
it easier to add funds to your account in the future.
(You will still have to enter your password every time.)

If anything is unclear about Nintendo eShop,
please visit the Nintendo website before contacting Nintendo.

*Please confirm the telephone number before calling.

For inquiries regarding a specific title,
please refer to the list of publishers
below or to that title's manual for contact information.

Please note that individual publishers will not answer questions regarding game strategy or tips.

You have chosen to use high video quality.

If video playback is not smooth, please
change this setting to standard video quality.
You have chosen standard video quality.

High-quality video offers a better picture but may not play
smoothly if your Internet connection is not fast enough.
If this is the case, please select standard quality.
If you have a Club Nintendo membership, you can link it to your Nintendo Network ID.

By linking your Club Nintendo account, you will be eligible for added benefits. For details, please see club.nintendo.com.
Your Club Nintendo account can only be linked with one Nintendo Network ID. Club Nintendo accounts cannot be linked to multiple users. For more details, please see the above website.
Your Club Nintendo membership is now linked.

The link between your Club Nintendo
membership and your Nintendo Network ID
has been removed.

You can remove the link between your Club Nintendo membership
and your Nintendo Network ID.

Please note that if you remove this link and your ID is linked to
other devices, your Club Nintendo membership will be unlinked
for all of them.

An unlinked membership and ID can always be linked again later.

Are you sure you want to unlink your
Club Nintendo membership and your
Nintendo Network ID?
This feature is restricted by Parental Controls. To remove the relevant Parental Controls restriction(s), enter your PIN.

If the Game Rating item is restricted, PIN entry removes this restriction until you leave Nintendo eShop. If the Wii U Shopping Services item is restricted, PIN entry removes this restriction only for the next transaction.

You cannot view information
about this software.

To verify your credit-card information,
please enter the zip code of the card's billing address.

To verify your credit-card information,
please enter the postal code of the card's billing address.

corresponds to the zip code you entered.

entered and try again.

We were unable to find an area that
corresponds to the postal code you
entered.

Please check over the information you
entered and try again.
Your address is set to the following:

Your location settings require calculating sales tax when purchasing software.
If your address changes, select Change Address to update the information.

Please enter your zip code.
This is required to calculate sales tax.
Please select the option that best matches your location.
If this information is correct, select OK.

Your address information is out of date.
You must enter your current address in order to purchase software in Nintendo eShop.

Would you like to update your address information now?

We were unable to find an area that
corresponds to the zip code you have
entered. Please check over the information
you entered and try again.

Please enter your province.
This is required to calculate sales tax.
If you are under the age of 18, please have an adult read over this information.

The connection to the server has
timed out due to user inactivity.

and try again.
